Here's my plan to get us organized:

I see Mike has joined - welcome aboard! ðŸŽ‰ Let's take a moment to get everyone acquainted. Could each person share a quick intro with your name, where you're from, and what you're hoping to get out of this trip? I'll keep track of who's in the group as we go.

After that, I'd love to start brainstorming some destination ideas. Everyone feel free to suggest anywhere that excites you - the more ideas the better! Once we have a good list, we can start discussing and voting. 

Sound good? I'm here to help keep us moving forward, so just let me know if you have any other
